egXML.p: The TEI defines six global attributes; their names are xml:id, rend, xml:lang, n, xml:space, and xml:base; style is not among them.

remarks.p: A namespace prefix may be used in order to specify the scheme as an alternative to specifying it via the scheme attribute: it takes precedence
